description:
Midterms are coming up and while Kyosuke is tutoring Hikaru, Madoka is tutoring Kyosuke, and Kyosuke is being stalked by someone jealous of how close he`s getting to a certain special someone...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aitsu ga Rival, Koi no Chuukanshiken
Quello è il mio rivale?! Gli esami dell`amore
That Kid`s My Rival - Midterm Exam of Love
あいつがライバル, 恋の中間試験
